ygData.subject: Re: Silk Armors
ygData.msgSnippet: There are now several types of silk to be made.  As you mentioned: Silk- made by combining spider silk Cured Silk- made by combining silk with heady kiola and
ygData.messageBody:
There are now several types of silk to be made. As you mentioned:
Silk- made by combining spider silk
Cured Silk- made by combining silk with heady kiola and other items
Glowing Silk- made by combining silk (or maybe cured silk) with enchanters
"mana" spells (vicious, purified, etc)
Shadowed Silk- made by combining silk (don't know which one) with necromancer
spells, and quest items

Not sure of all the stuff found so far, but several of the web sites have the
instructions

Ailamil Faithbringer
T. Marr
